name: Super Ultimate Rock Paper Scissors Simulator
name_original: Super Ultimate Rock Paper Scissors Simulator
description:
In S.U.R.P.S.S. you watch simplistic A.I. units brawl endlessly!

 Select different backgrounds and obstacles for them to encounter or set them to continuously battle and rack up a score!

This simulator is a great screen saver and time waster!

Rock!

Paper!

Scissors!

This was a small project that I was working on for less than a week. Nonetheless I finished it so I figured that I'd upload it somewhere.
